answers.answer: Not everytime. I got it done 2-3 times my whole pregnancy.
I got it done my first appointment(about 5 tubes) and at my anatomy scan I got 2 tubes.
Your first time then the glucose test and again if you fail it and the diabetes test and if you want it the down syndrome test. So anywhere from 3-5 times depending on your health.

The first time I got my blood drawn at 7 weeks they took 15 tubes. After that at 12 weeks I just had a finger prick (which I find worse) and next time I don't believe I have any... But after that I don't know lol

Ive gotten tested for everything and I didn't receive a call back from the doc so I'm guessing I'm healthy as ever...but they shot me in my left arm and didn't get anything but since I'm right handed they took all the blood from that arm

I've had more blood taken than most because I've been in and out of the hospital quite a lot during my first trimester. But the usual is to have blood taken at your 12w scan, again at 16w if you have the DS test (I didn't get it), again at 28w and I think that is it :)

Ugh yes! The worst part is doctor's visit, wait till they start getting all in between your legs! Lol but I went to my first appt and they blew my veins in both arms, I switched doctor's because of it! Now my new doctor office did the smoothest blood draw I've ever been threw!
I know! I had no idea they took so much lol
They didn't take that much from me. They took about 3 big tubes my first visit at 7weeks, and took three big tubes again at 28ish weeks for my glucose test.

When you get your blood drawn how long are the results? I just got all mine done on Tuesday and they told me it would take 3-4 days and if they didn't call everything was okay. But I still q8 worried.

They never called me, they told me it could take up to 3 weeks to get results back. My first visit they didn't call or anything, they just told me at my next visit that I was negative for HIV/AIDS and all the other STDs. The diabetes test they didn't call either, I called them and they said if they didn't call I passed.
I had 5 or 6 tubes during my 9w6d visit, nothing at my 2nd visit, then I just had 1 tube drawn for the quad screening at 18w6d.. sooo, we'll see how the next few visits go I guess.. 19w3d today! (((:

question: Ftm & I never knew while pregnant we have to get at least 6tubes of blood drawn lol will they continue to draw blood every time I go to the doc?
title: blood drawn
